mapper.select: SELECT ST_DATE.ST_DAY AS PROCESS_DATE ,NVL(A.TOTAL_CNT,0) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')+LEVEL-1, 'YYYYMMDD') ST_DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')-TO_DATE(to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')+1) )ST_DATE, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(INS_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') PROCESS_DATE, COUNT (1) TOTAL_CNT FROM VISITOR_FOOOTPRINT GROUP BY TO_CHAR(INS_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') )A WHERE ST_DATE.ST_DAY = A.PROCESS_DATE(+) ORDER BY ST_DAY ASC
